name: Cybertech Corporation
overview: Earth: 2025 AD Man's accomplishments in the last 25 years have been remarkable.The unification of the world's largest powers saw the end to the wars of the 20th century. Scientists, now working for the benefit of mankind, have managed to halt the ageing process. Now space travel is no longer a dream, but reality. The combination of positronic pathways and neural networks gave birth to a new breed do computer... The cyborg was developed by Cybertech Corporation in 2019. But, as with most of man's creations, the cyborg did not bring with it the benefits that man had striven so hard to achieve. Aboard the starship Sigma-5 the first stage of the cyborg rebellion has started. Most of the human crew have been slaughtered - only a handful of personnel are still alive. It is only a matter of time, a very short matter of time. The future lies in your hands. Have you got what it takes?
